creator: mak-apache-bugzilla@greenhills.co.uk
text:
When I start Tomcat, it produces:

  null Opening server socket on all host IP addresses
  ...
  HttpConnector[7779] Starting background thread

That "null" makes it look like something is wrong.

The problem is that HttpConnector.log() (in both http and http10
connectors) uses the threadName before it has been set.

Various fixes are possible -- you can surpress the printing of
the threadName unless it is set, or simply set it to "HttpConnector".

Patches for both options are available from the URL.
